roleset.name: take back or cause to lack an explaination
roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to explain.01. Explain.01 is a member of VN classes indicate-78-1 and transfer_mesg-37.1.1. Framed by Katie.

example.name: VBN cause to lack (VBN, so don't tag 'no')
take back an explaination
example.text: Well, you will just have to unexplain to her then, won't you?
